Definition at line 29 of file area.cpp.

◆ get_distance()

bool area::get_distance ( cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Request &  req,
cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &  res 
)

Return the distance of a given point to the area boundary (outside or inside the area). Based on https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10983872/distance-from-a-point-to-a-polygon.

Parameters
reqThe coordinates of the point to check. If it is empty (0,0), the area origin is used.
resThe coordinates of the closest area boundary line segment, the coordinates of the closest point on the boundary, and the distance.
Returns
Whether request succeeded.

)

Get the rotation of the area given by coordinates. Assuming a quadrilateral.

Parameters
reqEmpty request.
resThe angle that the bottom edge of the area is rotated with respect to the x-axis.
Returns
Whether the request succeeded.
